page.title: 01GAZETEER
page.content: The block covers part of the Eastern section of Lothian Region. The main town is TRANENT which has a history stretching back to the 12th century. The main industry used to be coal-mining. A rich agricultural region lies to the east of the block where the small village of Macmerry is situated. TRANENT is a rapidly expanding town situated on the A1 trunk road. Travel to Edinburgh will be fascilitated by the building of a by-pass which will ease traffic congestion in TRANENT. {CONTENTS HOUSING(1) EMPLOYMENT(1) LOCAL HISTORY(1) LANDSCAPE & BUILDINGS (1) HEALTH(1) RECREATION(2) RELIGION(1) EDUCATION(1) ENERGY(1) ATTITUDES(3) BIOGRAPHY(1) CUSTOMS(2) HOME LIFE(2) ACKNOWLEDGEMENTS(1)
